LanguageData.QRY_Quarry.label: quarry
LanguageData.QRY_Quarry.description: A large pit for digging up long buried resources.
LanguageData.QRY_Quarry_Blueprint.label: quarry (blueprint)
LanguageData.QRY_Quarry_Frame.label: quarry (building)
LanguageData.QRY_Quarry_Frame.description: A large pit for digging up long buried resources.
LanguageData.QRY_MiniQuarry.label: mini quarry
LanguageData.QRY_MiniQuarry.description: A small pit for digging up long buried resources.
LanguageData.QRY_MiniQuarry_Blueprint.label: mini quarry (blueprint)
LanguageData.QRY_MiniQuarry_Frame.label: mini quarry (building)
LanguageData.QRY_MiniQuarry_Frame.description: A small pit for digging up long buried resources.
LanguageData.QRY_Platform.label: quarry platform
LanguageData.QRY_Platform.description: A platform quarry workers will haul resources to. Must be placed next to a quarry, preferably near the ladders. Quarries can be linked to only one or two platforms.
LanguageData.QRY_Platform_Blueprint.label: quarry platform (blueprint)
LanguageData.QRY_Platform_Frame.label: quarry platform (building)
LanguageData.QRY_Platform_Frame.description: A platform quarry workers will haul resources to. Must be placed next to a quarry, preferably near the ladders. Quarries can be linked to only one or two platforms.
